db.app

Class DBUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.app.DBUtils

  • public class DBUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for handling jdbc towards the my_municipality database.
    On loading of this class, the SQLite driver is loaded.
    This class is a Singleton. To get hold of the instance of this class, call the static method getInstance(). The instance is guaranteed to have a working Connection to the database my_municipalities.
